item.description:
We're trying out a new location for our monthly brunch in January -- Angelico's Lake House, 81 North Main Street, East Hampton. It's an upscale place and we have place reserved on the all season porch overlooking the lake. Cost is $17 plus tax and tip (and our $1 event fee). RSVP's are mandatory!

Directions: Take Route 66 from either Route 2 or Middletown and take North Main Street to the restaurant on the left.
item.name: Fourth Sunday Brunch
